d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - GMP - Applicable artifacts for template
d2_dictionary.title: Used for GMP template document scoping.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct d3.alias_value as name from dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d1, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d2, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d3, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d4 where d1.dictionary_name = 'GMP Artifacts Classification by Groups and Subgroups' and d2.dictionary_name = d1.dictionary_name and d3.dictionary_name = d1.dictionary_name and d3.dictionary_name = d4.dictionary_name and d2.dictionary_key = d1.dictionary_key and d3.dictionary_key = d1.dictionary_key and d3.dictionary_key = d4.dictionary_key and d1.alias_name = 'GMP Groups' and d2.alias_name = 'GMP Subgroups' and d3.alias_name = 'GMP Artifacts' and d4.alias_name='Artifact Label' and ('!$value(applicable_groups[0])' = '!' or d1.alias_value in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_groups))) and ('!$value(applicable_subgroups[0])' = '!' or d2.alias_value in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_subgroups))) and (d4.alias_value not like 'DHF%' and d4.alias_value not like 'DMR%') order by 1
